name: tram-one-express
description: Generator to build Tram-One applications quickly

scripts.postpublish:build: rm -rf tram-one-example && node generator.js tram-one-example --no-install --no-commit --url tram-one-express
scripts.postpublish:deploy-app: cd ./tram-one-example && npm ci && npm run deploy
scripts.postpublish: npm run postpublish:build && postpublish:deploy-repo && npm run postpublish:deploy-app

author: Jesse Jurman
